channel.title: TscapeT v1.1 second Release[added new pics for features]
channel.description:
this is my second Release to TscapeT its v1.1 Ok... Server DOwnload Site [WITH NPCS]: [url=http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ]http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ]http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ]http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ]http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ[/url]
----Map 1 : Home area [url=http://i34.tinypic.com/287pvrb.jpg]http://i34.tinypic.com/287pvrb.jpg[/url]
*Features*V1 ----------- *Made new Home *Added new starter packeg *Fixed soem dupes of the real-world shit *Added Banks &Objects and alot of changes *Added new Shops like 7 or more in home area and alot more in out of range *Added over 3k Npcs in the game *Fixed some command such banning &Setitem dont work auto bans *Added Some commands of emotes ::afk ::moonwalk ::superman ::sleep ::setback [ theirs chairs at home] *Removed Attack option out of the wildy *Added wildy lvls *ADDED hallowen Custom [Silab] and hallowen event not tested yet *Made new teleports in the magics , And can use ::switch for normal /ancients all knows *Added Barrows & Slayer tower Places and stuff will be found Front OF Heros Guild in travely tele *Added New skillcapes shop afront of hero guild *Made new Area called roflscape and added command ::roflscape to go their its like roflscape with shops [not edited yet] *Added new skills and fixed some of them *Made new Following 100% works [From the Tuts] *Removed Duel Option For due dupes... *Added quest points and quest in tbas but removed make ur own lol
____________ *Features*V2 ----------- @I Added new Arenas training places @FIXED SOME BUGS @made real agility emote walking @updated new starter place @New avabile quests @New All skill Menus work ... added some information @Added New working clan chat [::clanhelp for more information] @Fixed some weapons specials @Added some shops... @Added New npcs @Added new Dueling sign in duel arena @Added new Castle wars tab in castle wars place and u can pk there no lose items [ not finished thought] @Edited Max combat lvl @Edited Max Skills lvl @Fully working prayer by me!@@@ @added New item dialog... like the teleport device @Working if : poison + dagger = ddp @Working Herblore ... @working fleching @Working wcing like rs -thanks to i pk u... tut @Working fishing @Working Slayer @Working Agility 100% @Working Smithing @Working Mining @Working Fire making
@Working all skills was in Devo v7
NOT WORKING FARMING CUS I FORGOT ABOUT IT X[) @Note:It would be my pleasure to make a xmas Event soon if you want
There alot more stuff in server Hope you like it
1. Home [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2ajay6d.png[/img] 2.Agility [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/352f7ef.jpg[/img] 3.Edge Wildy [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/161e32v.jpg[/img] 4. Offical Places to go .. [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/98c0h3.jpg[/img] 5.fishing [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/1z5oi77.jpg[/img] 6.Varr Wildy [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/3448mjq.jpg[/img] 7.Hidden island [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/imuknr.jpg[/img] 8.shops [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/23wwgaa.jpg[/img]
MORE CUSTOM PICS [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/5vua7m.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/xf6crc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/1zdujy9.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2j4t73k.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/9j23d1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2rppm3s.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2vnrxmo.jpg[/img]
Im gonna start on new source richscape source i already started because i cant host any more forgot the Internet pass & user x[) kinda funny
If need help tell me i will help if i can
Server Download Site [url=http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ]http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ]http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ]http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ]http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ[/url]
PLEASE KEEP THIS TOPIC ALIVE Forgot say Max skill lvl is 100 Means max combat level is 127 :D
Credits: Real-World Maker ... he did almost nothing.. tuts makers in tut Section.. only some tuts like pir connections Anan [ME] Everything into server including fixed dupes

item.title: TscapeT v1.1 second Release[added new pics for features]
item.dc:creator: @CarScape CarScape
item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

this is my second Release to TscapeT its v1.1
Ok…
Server DOwnload Site [WITH NPCS]:
http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ
http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ
http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ
http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ

----Map 1 : Home area
http://i34.tinypic.com/287pvrb.jpg

FeaturesV1

*Made new Home
*Added new starter packeg
*Fixed soem dupes of the real-world shit
*Added Banks &Objects and alot of changes
*Added new Shops like 7 or more in home area and alot more in out of range
*Added over 3k Npcs in the game
*Fixed some command such banning &Setitem dont work auto bans
*Added Some commands of emotes ::afk ::moonwalk ::superman ::sleep ::setback [ theirs chairs at home]
*Removed Attack option out of the wildy
*Added wildy lvls
*ADDED hallowen Custom [Silab] and hallowen event not tested yet
*Made new teleports in the magics , And can use ::switch for normal /ancients all knows
*Added Barrows & Slayer tower Places and stuff will be found Front OF Heros Guild in travely tele
*Added New skillcapes shop afront of hero guild
*Made new Area called roflscape and added command ::roflscape to go their its like roflscape with shops [not edited yet]
*Added new skills and fixed some of them
*Made new Following 100% works [From the Tuts]
*Removed Duel Option For due dupes…
*Added quest points and quest in tbas but removed make ur own lol

FeaturesV2

@I Added new Arenas training places
@FIXED SOME BUGS
@made real agility emote walking
@updated new starter place
@New avabile quests
@New All skill Menus work … added some information
@Added New working clan chat
[::clanhelp for more information]
@Fixed some weapons specials
@Added some shops…
@Added New npcs
@Added new Dueling sign in duel arena
@Added new Castle wars tab in castle wars place and u can pk there no lose items [ not finished thought]
@Edited Max combat lvl
@Edited Max Skills lvl
@Fully working prayer by me!@@@
@added New item dialog… like the teleport device
@Working if : poison + dagger = ddp
@Working Herblore …
@working fleching
@Working wcing like rs -thanks to i pk u… tut
@Working fishing
@Working Slayer
@Working Agility 100%
@Working Smithing
@Working Mining
@Working Fire making

@Working all skills was in Devo v7

NOT WORKING FARMING CUS I FORGOT ABOUT IT X[)
@Note:It would be my pleasure to make a xmas Event soon if you want

There alot more stuff in server Hope you like it

  1. Home
    2ajay6d.png765×503

    2.Agility
    352f7ef.jpg773×532

    3.Edge Wildy
    161e32v.jpg772×529
  2. Offical Places to go …

    5.fishing

    6.Varr Wildy

    7.Hidden island

    8.shops

MORE CUSTOM PICS

xf6crc.jpg508×704

9j23d1.jpg763×499

2rppm3s.jpg764×525

2vnrxmo.jpg752×501

Im gonna start on new source richscape source
i already started because i cant host any more forgot the Internet pass & user
x[) kinda funny

If need help tell me i will help if i can

http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ

http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ
http://uppit.com/7MEGXQ

Anan [ME] Everything into server including fixed dupes
